about.title: About Me
about.description: Hello, my name is Juan Cruz Dauberte and I am 21 years old. I am passionate about technology, especially software and challenges. I am  finishing my  Degree in IT Analyst at the National University of San Antonio de Areco (UNSAdA). In the other hand, I am studying at the digital academy  call Coderhouse as a Fullstack MERN Web Developer. My focus is on Frontend development applying my knowledge in personal projects using tools and technologies such as TypeScript, JavaScript, and React. Regarding Backend I focus on building solutions using technologies like Node js, Express Js and Mongoose. For data storage, I have knowledge of SQL databases (MySQL and PostgreSQL) and NoSQL (MongoDB). I aim to contribute to initiatives that support both my professional and personal growth, while creating a positive impact within the organization. Thank you for your time and consideration, I hope we have the chance to collaborate in the future!
about.descriptionBesides: I really enjoy sports and I'm passionate about physical activities. I love playing football with my friends, going to the gym, and playing padel. In my free time, I enjoy programming and coming up with ideas for new challenges and projects. Thank you very much for your time!
